connectorUiConfig.title: TacitRed Compromised Credentials
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: Ingest compromised credential findings from TacitRed using the Common Connector Framework (CCF).

sampleQueries.query: TacitRed_Findings_CL | where TimeGenerated >= ago(7d) | project TimeGenerated, email_s, domain_s, confidence_d, source_s

dataTypes.name: TacitRed_Findings_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery: TacitRed_Findings_CL | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated) | where isnotempty(Time)

customs.name: TacitRed API Key
customs.description: API key stored in Azure Key Vault or provided at deployment time.

instructionSteps.title: Provide API Key
instructionSteps.description: For enhanced security, enable Key Vault integration to store and retrieve the API key.
